wikipedia_page.main: Paul Darren Masefield  (born 21 October 1970) is an English former football right back and TV pundit who played professional football in England for a number of years before moving to Asia and playing in local Asian leagues.

link_mentions.page: List of Hong Kong Top Footballers

response: Seema hosted for Star Sports India the Hero Indian Super League (ISL) Season 2 presenting both the live Player Draft Auction and the live matches from the studio over a 3-month period with experts Paul Masefield, Ashley Westwood and Gary O'Reilly. The live broadcast featured a pre and post show with a half time analysis with global viewing figures reaching over 207 million. The review show Let's Football also hosted by Seema covered the main talking points of this tournament.  In addition, Seema presented a live show Let's Talk Football reviewing all of the weekend's Premier League action.
